rpc.dataretrieval

Packages that use rpc.dataretrieval

Classes in rpc.dataretrieval used by rpc.dataretrieval
Aggregator
          This class provides a skeletal implementation of an Aggregator to be used as a function over set-valued attributes.
ContingencyTable
          A 2-dimensional table of counts of observations for pairs of variables.
ContingencyTable3D
          A 3-dimensional table of counts of observations for pairs of variables across different configurations of a third set of variables.
 

Classes in rpc.dataretrieval used by rpc.design
Aggregator
          This class provides a skeletal implementation of an Aggregator to be used as a function over set-valued attributes.
 

Classes in rpc.dataretrieval used by rpc.querygen
Aggregator
          This class provides a skeletal implementation of an Aggregator to be used as a function over set-valued attributes.
 

Classes in rpc.dataretrieval used by rpc.schema
Aggregator
          This class provides a skeletal implementation of an Aggregator to be used as a function over set-valued attributes.
 

Classes in rpc.dataretrieval used by rpc.statistics
DataRetrieval
          The DataRetrieval class accepts a design that corresponds to a set of variables and their aggregators and retrieves the data from the database that holds observations about the design.
StatisticResults
          The StatisticsResults object holds information about the results of a statistical test, including the test statistic, degrees of freedom, p-value, sample size, and strength of effect.
